ValidationErrors.name: Expected three initial errors
ValidationErrors.ValidationError: Entity type 'EntityType5' in model 'ORMModel1' requires a local preferred reference scheme or supertype(s) that provide preferred identification.
Entity type 'EntityType6' in model 'ORMModel1' requires a local preferred reference scheme or supertype(s) that provide preferred identification.
Role '1' of fact type 'EntityType6TestValueType1' in model 'ORMModel1' has a value constraint with no associated value type.

TestReport.Message: Scenario 1: Make 5->2 preferred path, sibling and downstream subtypes should all be preferred
5->4, 6->5, 6->7 are on the preferred path: True
ValueConstraint should be a string type: {'10'}
Scenario 2: Make 5->3 preferred path, downstream subtypes are no ambiguous

ValidationErrors.name: Two errors expected
ValidationErrors.ValidationError: Entity type 'EntityType6' in model 'ORMModel1' requires a local preferred reference scheme or supertype(s) that provide preferred identification.
Role '1' of fact type 'EntityType6TestValueType1' in model 'ORMModel1' has a value constraint with no associated value type.

TestReport.Message: 6->7 is not on the preferred path: True
ValueConstraint should be a number type: {10}
6->5 is not on the preferred path: True
ValueConstraint should be a string type: {'10'}
Scenario 5: Delete 7->4 to break subtype structure

ValidationErrors.name: Expecting invalid graph, detached valuetype, and no reference scheme errors
ValidationErrors.ValidationError: Direct supertypes of object type 'EntityType6' in model 'ORMModel1' must be overlapping without transitive implication or mutual exclusion.
Entity type 'EntityType7' in model 'ORMModel1' requires a local preferred reference scheme or supertype(s) that provide preferred identification.
Role '1' of fact type 'EntityType6TestValueType1' in model 'ORMModel1' has a value constraint with no associated value type.

TestReport.Message: Scenario 6: Delete 6->5 to make graph valid

ValidationErrors.name: Expecting detached valuetype and no reference scheme errors
ValidationErrors.ValidationError: Entity type 'EntityType7' in model 'ORMModel1' requires a local preferred reference scheme or supertype(s) that provide preferred identification.
Role '1' of fact type 'EntityType6TestValueType1' in model 'ORMModel1' has a value constraint with no associated value type.

TestReport.Message: Scenario 7: Set identifier on 7 to clear errors

ValidationErrors.name: Scenario 8: (Undo scenarios 5-7) Make 5->4 preferred path and give 4 an explicit id in one transaction
Scenario 9: (Undo scenario 8) Make 5->4 preferred path then give 4 an explicit id to make 5 and 6 ambiguous
